verbose_text: Therefore, unabated TLR stimulation by CpG-ODN or other mitogens, which is not followed by active vitamin D receptor engagement, may significantly increase the percentage of cell surface, CLIP positive B cells, and the relative amount of CLIP expressed per cell leading to ongoing nonspecific inflammation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
